target comprehensive_example:
    key:"Comprehensive test example"
    dictionnary:
        planning:"Project planning phase"
        development:"Code development"
        testing:"Quality assurance"
        deployment:"Production deployment"
        meeting:"Team coordination"

    law project_kickoff:
        start_date:2024-01-02 at 09:00
        period:4.0
        Event:
            kickoff[meeting]:"Project kickoff meeting"
            requirements[planning]:"Requirements gathering"
        GROUP:(kickoff 2.0^0.30 - requirements 1.30^0)
    end_law

    target development_phase:
        key:"Development work"
        dictionnary:
            frontend[development]:"User interface development"
            backend[development]:"Server-side logic"
            database[development]:"Database design"

        law sprint_1:
            start_date:2024-01-03 at 09:00
            period:40.0
            Event:
                ui[frontend]:"UI component development"
                api[backend]:"REST API implementation"
                schema[database]:"Database schema design"
            GROUP:(ui 15.0^1.0 - api 20.0^1.0 - schema 4.0^0)
        end_law

        law sprint_2:
            start_date:2024-01-10 at 09:00
            period:40.0
            Event:
                ui[frontend]:"UI polish and animations"
                api[backend]:"API optimization"
                integration[backend]:"System integration"
            GROUP:(ui 10.0^1.0 - api 15.0^1.0 - integration 14.0^0)
        end_law
    end_target

    law testing_phase:
        start_date:2024-01-17 at 09:00
        period:24.0
        Event:
            unit[testing]:"Unit testing"
            integration[testing]:"Integration testing"
            user[testing]:"User acceptance testing"
        GROUP:(unit 8.0^1.0 - integration 10.0^1.0 - user 5.0^0)
    end_law

    law deployment:
        start_date:2024-01-19 at 14:00
        period:4.0
        Event:
            staging[deployment]:"Staging deployment"
            production[deployment]:"Production deployment"
            verification[deployment]:"Post-deployment verification"
        GROUP:(staging 1.0^0.30 - production 1.0^0.30 - verification 1.0^0)
    end_law

    law retrospective:
        start_date:2024-01-19 at 16:00
        period:2.0
        Event:
            review[meeting]:"Project review meeting"
            planning[meeting]:"Next sprint planning"
        GROUP:(review 1.0^0.30 - planning 0.30^0)
    end_law
end_target
